poem:
**Voices of Discord**

The tongues of power   
speak in riddles,  
whispering blame  
into the stagnant air.  
One side points,  
the other calls,  
their words collide—  
a silent storm.  
In the havoc,  
truth lingers,  
a ghost whispering  
amidst the clamor  
of the living's  
self-imposed  
deafness.
